description: Standard table definitions for Prediction Markets.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the snapshot (in unix time).

block_date.description: The timestamp truncated (ie, YYYY-MM-DD format for daily snapshots and YYYY-MM-DD HH:00:00 for hourly snapshots).

chain_id.description: The standard id of the chain.

user_address.description: The address of the user that owns this order in the snapshot.

market_address.description: The smart contract of the address of the market (if no smart contract, please create a unique identifier for the market).

order_id.description: Identifier for the particular limit order.

open_order_size_usd.description: The USD value of the open amount for this particular limit order.

closed_order_size_usd.description: The USD value of the open amount for this particular limit order in the interval for the given timestamp.

locked_order_size_usd.description: The USD value of the open filled and matched for this particular limit order.

poll_open_timestamp.description: The timestamp that the poll opens at.

poll_close_timestamp.description: The timestamp that the poll closes at.
